pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, 512 MB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 720p @ 30 FPS. 4 players gameplay.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R9 270x, 2 GB
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: High 1080p @ 60 FPS. 4 Players gameplay.
